trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Richmond
There was one other sighting in Richmond on or around October 20th 2011
Summary: Round ball of green light in the color of a green traffic signal.
divs: sighting detailssaw a green ball of light that amazed me for about 5 seconds. the color was about as green as a traffic signal light. it hovered and zipped out of the air faster than i could blink.object moved up then dipped down and zoomed off in a lateral direction. we were playing an outdoor hockey game and the time was approximately 9:15pm est on october 20th 2011 .(address removed)cms 10\21\11 18:21 cst flg. sighting occurred j\ north of richmond and j\ south of ashland in hanover county. i am still in disbelief as i am a huge fan of the paranormal and never thought that i would experience something like this.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
